PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
ZLLPlatform

ZLLPlatform component provides a set of API functions and macros that may be used to implement certain ZigBee Light Link features in a user application

  • Link Initiator API to be used on touchlink initiators
  • Link Target API to be used on touchlink targets
  • DeviceInfo API for setting and getting ZLL parameters
  • Connection API for discovering and joining ZigBee networks
  • Finite State Machine API
